column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and creative intern to join our team. In this role, you will gain valuable experience in both video editing and graphic design, working on a variety of exciting projects.              Key Responsibilities.          Assist in the creation and editing of video content for various platforms including social media, websites, and presentations.      Develop and design graphic elements such as logos, banners, infographics, and illustrations to enhance visual appeal.      Collaborate with team members to brainstorm ideas and concepts for video and graphic projects.      Utilize video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) and graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) to bring creative visions to life.      Ensure consistency of brand identity and messaging across all visual materials.      Assist with other creative tasks and projects as needed.              Qualifications:          A degree program in film production, graphic design, multimedia arts, or a related field.      Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.      Strong graphic design skills with experience using Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.).      Creative thinker with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.      Excellent communication and collaboration skills.      Ability to work efficiently in a deadline-driven environment.      Prior experience with motion graphics, animation is a plus.      A portfolio showcasing previous video editing and graphic design work is highly encouraged.              Benefits:          Gain valuable experience in a fast-paced and creative environment.      Work on a variety of exciting projects that make a difference.      Potential for a full-time position

Join our Team as a Photographer at Lucknow Office Crazy Fox Creations is a growing team and constantly looking for new talent.  As we expand,   Photographer Jobs at Lucknow Office -  Crazy Fox Creations Join our Team as a Photographer at Lucknow Office Crazy Fox Creations is a growing team and constantly looking for new talent.  As we expand,  we are looking for dynamic individuals in Lucknow with a great passion for all things creative to join our gang.  We are hiring full- time photographers for still and editorial photography.  Our ideal candidate should be a keen observer with an eye for design and detail.  You should be proficient in studio photography with an ability to produce and source high- quality photography for our multiple projects.  The role would also require you to manage studio schedule and the photo archives.  The photographer must be well- versed in all genres of photography and willing to work on multiple projects simultaneously.  Must have an experience in photo research and should respect deadlines.  As a photographer,  you would get an opportunity to work on multiple assignments related to cooking,  gardening,  DIY projects and trend pieces,  etc.  If you enjoy working independently in a fast- paced and creative environment,  we would love to hear from you.  Job requirements for a photographer at our Lucknow office:  Carrying out research and preparation for a shoot.  Should deliver high- quality photos for our multiple projects related to gardening,  cooking,  health and wellness.   Coordinate in- house shoot schedules.   Manage in- house photo archives.  What we are looking for in our photographers:  3 to 4 years experience in gardening,  food,  product,  home and lifestyle photography.   BFA in photography or related field preferred.   Experience in photo studio management.   Experience working with stock photo houses.   Should have know- how of technical equipment,  including cameras,  lenses,  framing,  lighting,  and photo retouching and specialist software.   Photographic portfolio demonstrating a high proficiency in digital photography,  lighting,  composition and creativity.   Proficiency with industry software (Adobe Photoshop CS6,  Lightroom,  and Capture One Pro)  Knowledge in a variety of color management and photo workflows.   Should be committed and punctual when delivering the work.

column2: Moris Media is seeking a skilled and creative    freelance photographer    to collaborate with us on capturing dynamic event photos and compelling product images for our moCal brand. Youll play an essential role in visually showcasing the energy of our events and highlighting the appeal of our products, ultimately contributing to our marketing success.             Event Photography:    Capture the atmosphere, energy, and key moments of moCal brand events, showcasing the brand experience to potential customers.           Product Photography:    Create visually appealing and detailed product images for e-commerce platforms, highlighting product features and overall aesthetic.           Lighting Expertise:    Demonstrate proficiency in various lighting techniques, both natural and studio-based, to produce well-lit and impactful images.           Composition Skills:    Possess a keen eye for detail and composition, ensuring images are balanced, visually engaging, and align with the moCal brands style.           Image Editing:    Utilize image editing software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom) to retouch, enhance, and prepare photos for marketing purposes.           Brand Alignment:    Understand the moCal brands personality and target audience, adapting the photographic style to suit the brands image.           Collaboration:    Communicate effectively and work collaboratively with the Moris Media team to understand project briefs and deliver images that meet their expectations.           Equipment Management:    Own and maintain professional-grade photography equipment including cameras, lenses, and lighting gear.           Adaptability:    Be flexible and adaptable to work in various environments, including event locations, studio settings, and potentially outdoors.           Reliability:    Maintain a strong work ethic, meet deadlines consistently, and deliver exceptional quality photographs for each project.               Required Qualifications:           Portfolio:    A strong portfolio demonstrating proficiency in the relevant photography areas. For Moris Media, this means a mix of compelling event photography and well-executed product photography.       Technical Skills:    Mastery of professional photography equipment (DSLR/mirrorless cameras, lenses, lighting) and image editing software (Adobe Photoshop, Lightroom, or equivalent).       Experience:    While the exact years can vary, some proven experience is essential. For event and product photography, 1-3 years of experience provides a solid foundation.         Highly Desirable Qualifications:           Brand Understanding:    The ability to adapt ones photographic style to embody a brands personality and target audience. Demonstrating this through examples in a portfolio is a big plus.       E-commerce Experience:    Specific understanding of product photography principles for online platforms. This includes attention to detail, consistent lighting, and showcasing products from multiple angles.       Event Photography Experience:    Experience in capturing the energy and atmosphere of events, including a mix of detail shots, crowd photos, and candid moments.       Post-Production Expertise:    Advanced editing skills beyond basic adjustments, such as complex retouching, color grading, and creating image composites.       Own Equipment:    Possessing and maintaining a full set of professional-grade photography gear, suitable for both studio and on-location shoots.         Additional Considerations:           Personality:    Freelancers who are proactive, communicative, reliable, and enjoy a collaborative approach are often the most successful in building long-term working relationships.       Location:    While many freelance projects can be done remotely, a photographers proximity to Moris Medias base (or their willingness to travel) can be a factor, especially for on-site events or product shoots.                 Technical Photography Expertise:    In-depth knowledge of camera operation (DSLR or mirrorless), manual settings, lens selection, and lighting equipment for both event and product photography.           Composition & Aesthetics:    Ability to compose visually striking images with attention to detail, balance, and an understanding of how to highlight product features effectively.           Image Editing Proficiency:    Mastery of image editing software, such as Adobe Photoshop or Lightroom, for retouching, color correction, and image optimization.           Brand Sensitivity:    The ability to understand and translate the moCal brands personality, style, and target audience into your photography.           Event Photography Skills:    Capturing the energy, candid moments, and key highlights of events while maintaining a discreet and professional presence.           Product Photography Skills:    Understanding techniques to showcase products in a way thats both informative and visually appealing for e-commerce platforms.           Adaptability:    Comfortable working in various settings (studio, events, outdoor), quickly adjusting lighting, shooting styles, and approaches as needed.           Collaboration & Communication:    Strong communication skills to actively collaborate with the Moris Media team, understand project briefs, and ensure final images align with expectations.           Equipment Management:    Proactive in maintaining and updating your own professional photography equipment for reliability and optimal performance.           Reliability & Professionalism:    Meet deadlines, deliver consistent high-quality work, and maintain a professional demeanor that builds trust with Moris Media.
column11: Post production, Photography, Basic, Image editing, E-commerce, Manual, Management, Photoshop

column2: Position and its role within the company       We are looking for photographer who has an expertise in capturing high quality and attractive images & videos.       Responsibilities and Duties         Nature of the job will take you to multiple locations for

Position Requirement       What you need to do If you love your snaps, of you are the one who can go out without mobile out but not without your camera then we are looking for you. You ll be enjoying your love for photography here. All you need to show some love-piece to us by your skills at food/travel and Human- candid photography. You need to have all your photography equipment of your own. The candidate must be able to do their own research on pictures angle and shots. The candidate must have good understanding of camera angles and picture shots. Understanding of picture editing and video shooting skills will be considered as plus point.       Day-To-Day Requirements         Deciding on camera angle sand frames         Research on current trends in Food and travel genre for images and videos         Picture editing for image enhancement         Deciding upon the best camera angles and frames for pictures         Researching the trend in the retail market and suggesting the same to the team         Editing the pictures clicked so as to make it look appealing for various social media platforms         Sending the deliverables within the given deadline         Take and understand orders regarding the day s photography sessions, and ensure that any concerns are cleared before the start of the session.         Listen to instructions about setting up photography equipment in the proper manner, and ensure that these instructions are followed thoroughly.         Obtain photography equipment from the procurement manager, or storage areas, and set it up according to the provided instructions.         Ensure that cameras and lights are in good working order, and are set in the right place, and at the right angles.         Assist photographers by providing instructions to subjects to pose in specific manners that the photographer wants.         Adjust lights and reflecting surfaces to meet the specific requirements of the shoot.         Ensure that subjects are comfortable with their positions, by explaining the concepts of the theme to them.         Assist photographers in touching up exposed films, and ensuring that they look aesthetically pleasing.         Breakdown sets, and ensure that all photography equipment, objects, lights, and backgrounds are safely put away.         Participate in creative ideation phases         Conducting research on the given topic is mandatory to come up with good creative         Participation in pre-production and post-production phase for video creation          Creating copies for Ads         Following house-guidelines for creative design
